title: Taj Mahal
typeOfFood: Lacto, Indian, Buffet, Delivery, Take-out, Catering, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Local, family run restaurant offers traditional Indian cuisine cooked in a clay oven. Has a vegetarian menu section with around 26 dishes and list all ingredients. Accommodating to vegans and will make substitutions. Offers vegetarian buffet night on Wednesdays. Not wheelchair friendly as it's located in the basement and you must take stairs. A hookah bar is upstairs.
